ERF/XP modifier [mdmwii]
C209E098 00000004
2C040118 40820010
3E2000XX 3A31YYYY
7E24012E 3A200000
7C04002E 00000000
YYYY=ERF
XX="01" for rank higher than 22 or "00" if lower.
